gurmukhi: Bwvnw BY hrI BUiqlI BYhrw ] twkxI JwkxI swkxI isMDulw ]
translation: “You manifest yourself in accordance with everyone’s emotion; You are the fear-remover of the world; You are the chopper of everyone and associated with them, you are profound and serene like the sea;

gurmukhi: duDrw dRumKw dRuktw duDrI ] kMiplw jMiplw ihMgulw BYhrI ]64]
transliteration: Doukharaa Droumakhaa Droukataa Duddaree|| Kanpilaa Janpilaa Hingulaa Bhaidaree||64||
translation: “You are the double-edged sword and double-faced Durga; you are invincible; You are Hinglaj, the remover of the fear of all and all remember Thy Name.64.

gurmukhi: icqxI cwpxI cwrxI c`CxI ] ihMgulw ipMgulw gMDRbw j`CxI ]
transliteration: Chitani Chaapani Chaarni Chchhanee|| Hingulaa Pingulaa Gaddhrabaa Jachchhanee||
translation: " You are the rider of lion; you have charming eyes; You are Hinglaj, Pinglaj, a Gandharva woman and a Yaksha woman;

gurmukhi: brmxI crmxI prGxI pRwsxI ] KVgxI gVgxI sYQxI swpxI ]65]
transliteration: Barmani Charmani Darghani Praasanee|| Khadgani Gadgani Saithani Saapanee||65||
translation: “You are the destroyer of armours; you are the sword-wielder and thundering goddess and you are the lance like a female serpent.65.

gurmukhi: BImVw smdVw ihMglw kwrqkI ] su pRBw A`iCdw A`Drw mwrqkI ]
transliteration: Bheemadaa Samdadaa Hinglaa Kaartakee|| Su Prabhaa Achchhidaa Addhraa Maartakee||
translation: “You are renowned for your large body; You are Hinglaj and the goddess Kartikeyi You are glorious and indestructible and the base of all deaths;

gurmukhi: igMglI ihMglI iTMglI ipMglw ] ic`kxI crktw crptw cwNvfw ]66]
translation: “Your various names are Ginglaj, Hinglaj, Thinglaj, Pinglaj; You are Chamunda of tricky speed.66.

gurmukhi: AiC`dw AiB`dw Ais`qw A`DrI ] Aik`tw AK`fw AC`tw du`DrI ]
transliteration: Achhikkaa Abhiddaa Asittaa Adddaree|| Akittaa Akhaddaa Achhattaa Dudddaree||
translation: “O Goddess ! You are invincible, indiscriminate, non-white and base of all; you are unchopable and beyond all splendours;

gurmukhi: AMjnI AMbkw AsqRxI DwrxI ] A`CrM ADrw jgiq auDwrxI ]67]
transliteration: Anjanianbakaa Astranidhaaranee|| Achchhran Adharaa Jagad(i) Udhaaranee||67||
translation: “You are also Anjani, the mother of Hanuman; you are Ambika, who holds the weapons; you are imperishable, support of all and the redeemer of the world.67.

gurmukhi: AMjnI gMjnI swkVI sIqlw ] isDrI su pRBw swmlw qyqlw ]
translation: “You are Anjani, you are Shitala, the destroyer of all; you are serene like the sea and always remain absorbed;

gurmukhi: sMBrI gMBrI AMBrI Aktw ] duslw dRuiBKw dRuktw Aimtw ]68]
translation: “You are alert, serene; you are large and invincible like the sky; you have enwrapped all the world within yourself and you yourself are ineffaceable and destroyer of all.68.

gurmukhi: BYrvI BYhrI BUcrw BwvnI ] qiRkutw crptw cwNpfw mwnvI ]
transliteration: Bhairavibhaiharibhoochraa Bhaavanee|| Trikoutaa Charpat Chaanpadaa Maanvee||
translation: “O Goddess ! you are Bhairavi, the remover of fear and the mover in the world in the world; you are the Trikuti, Yogini, Chamunda and Manavi in practice;

gurmukhi: jobnw jYkrI jMBhr jwlpw ] qoqlw quMdlw dMqlI kwlkw ]69]
transliteration: Jobanaa Jaikarijanbh-har Jaalpaa|| Totalaa Toundalaa Dantalikaalkaa||69||
translation: “You are youthful, the killer of the demon Jambh; You are the goddess Kalika lisping, stuttering and stammering while being intoxicated.69.
